content: Bithin Alangot is a researcher at ST Engineering Electronics-SUTD Cybersecurity Laboratory, Singapore with Prof. Pawel. His research mainly focuses on network level attacks on Bitcoin lightclients. He is also intested in using Blockchain technology to enhance security of software distribution systems and authentication frameworks.

title: Bithin Alangot
